Instance.description: A Picker Interaction whose name is based on the lot that the player wants to travel to.
Instance.parents: SimPickerInteraction, PickerSingleChoiceSuperInteraction, PickerSuperInteraction, ImmediateSuperInteraction, SuperInteraction, Interaction

Tunable.name: get_display_name_from_destination
Tunable.description: If checked then we will attempt to get the Travel With Interaction Name from the venue we are trying to travel to and use that instead of display name.
